entry.title: Web: Cybersecurity Frameworks
entry.summary:
The frameworks presented here include Framework Hub (The Main Dashboard), OSINT Framework , Blue Team Framework , and Bug Bounty Framework . These frameworks are designed to help users find tools specific to each area, such as Blue Team, Bug Bounty, and OSINT.

entry.title: Bug Bounty Tools Assistant
entry.summary:
A Python-based interactive CLI tool designed to assist bug bounty hunters and security testers by providing quick access to commands for Recon, Exploitation, and Miscellaneous tasks.

entry.title: Deep Dork
entry.summary:
Deep Dork is an advanced Google Dorking tool designed to automate and streamline the process of discovering sensitive information exposed on the web. It leverages Google’s search engine, proxies, CAPTCHA bypass mechanisms, and result parsing to provide a powerful utility for ethical security research and reconnaissance.
In addition to the Python CLI version, Deep Dork Web is now available as a...

entry.title: Github Scraper
entry.summary:
Tool designed to scrape and analyze repositories from GitHub based on customizable search criteria.
